properties.areaDesc: S of Oregon Inlet NC to Cape Hatteras NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 12 at 3:00PM EST until January 13 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...HIGH SEAS WILL CONTINUE THROUGH EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING...
...DENSE SEA FOG MAY PERSIST THROUGH MID WEEK...

.Elevated seas will linger across the waters into early Wednesday
morning. Sea fog will be dense at times through Monday, and may
persist into mid week as warm and humid southwest winds continue
to blow over the cool waters.

* WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, dense fog will reduce
visibility to less than one mile. For the Small Craft
Advisory, seas 5 to 8 feet.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Oregon Inlet to Cape Hatteras.

* WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to 1
PM EST Monday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 5 AM EST
Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft. Low
visibility will make navigation difficult.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EST WEDNESDAY... ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST MONDAY
